listeningQuestion.question: What did Roy do to stop the thieves?
listeningQuestion.translation: 罗伊是如何阻止小偷的？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一位公交车司机勇敢阻止盗窃案的故事。课文使用了多个动作动词和时态，展示了事件的紧张过程。同时介绍了一些重要的语法点，如'so'和'such'的用法区别等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Roy Trenton used to drive a taxi.
A short while ago, however, he became a bus driver and he was not regretted it.
He is finding his new work far more exciting.
When he was driving along Catford Street recently, he saw two thieves rush out of a shop and run towards a waiting car.
One of them was carrying a bag full of money.
Roy acted quickly and drove the bus straight at the thieves.
The one with the money got such a fright that he dropped the bag.
As the thieves were trying to get away in their car, Roy drove his bus into the back of it.
While the battered car was moving away, Roy stopped his bus and telephoned the police.
The thieves' car was badly damaged and easy to recognize.
Shortly afterwards, the police stopped the car and both men were arrested.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 罗伊·特雷顿原是开出租汽车的。
然而就在前不久，他开上了公共汽车，也并不为此而感到后悔。
他发觉自己的新工作令人兴奋得多。
最近，当他正开车在凯特福德街上行驶时，看到有两个小偷从一家商店里冲出来，奔向等在那里的一辆汽车。
其中一个提着一只装满钞票的提包。
罗伊行动迅速，开车直冲窃贼而去。
拿钱的那个小偷吓得把提包都扔了。
当那两个小偷企图乘车逃跑时，罗伊驾驶他的公共汽车撞在了那辆车的后尾上。
当那辆被撞坏的车开走后，罗伊停下车，给警察挂了电话。
小偷的车损坏严重，很容易辨认。
没过多久，警察就截住了那辆车，两个小偷都被抓住了。

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 感知动词的用法
content: see, smell, feel, hear, watch, notice等感知动词可以用在'动词+名词/代词宾语+不带to的不定式'结构中
see sb. do sth. 表示看到全过程
see sb. doing sth. 表示看到部分过程
例句：He saw two thieves rush out of a shop.

notes.title: so和such的区别
content: such + (a/an) + 形容词 + 名词 + that...
例句：The one with the money got such a fright that he dropped the bag.
当形容词表示数量时（many, much, little, few），一律用so

notes.title: used to do的用法
content: used to do: 过去常常做现在不做了
be used to doing: 习惯于做某事
be used to do: 被用来做某事
例句：Roy Trenton used to drive a taxi.

notes.title: with的用法
content: with出现在名词或代词后作定语
例句：The one with the money got such a fright.

notes.example: The thief got such a fright that he dropped the bag.
The thieves were trying to get away in their car.

notes.context: 表示直接朝某个方向开去
notes.example: Roy drove the bus straight at the thieves.

notes.context: 表示在很短的时间之后
notes.example: Shortly afterwards, the police stopped the car.

multipleChoice.question: Why did the thief drop the bag?
options: Because the bag was too heavy

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: drop和fall的区别：drop是及物动词，表示'使掉落'；fall是不及物动词，表示'落下'。如：I drop the chalk（我把粉笔掉了）/ The chalk falls（粉笔掉下来）。

notes.title: 语言特点
notes.content: 本课使用了大量的动作动词和连续动作的描写，生动地展现了追捕窃贼的紧张场面。同时也使用了多种时态来表达不同时间段发生的事情。

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 在英语国家，公民协助警察抓捕罪犯是一种普遍现象，这体现了公民的社会责任感。但同时也要注意安全，不要采取危险的行动。
